solution_line_template: Since she works {normal_work_days_per_week} days a week, she earns {normal_work_days_per_week} x ${daily_normal_earnings} = $<<{normal_work_days_per_week}*{daily_normal_earnings}={weekly_normal_earnings}>>{weekly_normal_earnings} per week.
She gets an additional {overtime_hours_per_day} x ${hourly_rate} = $<<{overtime_hours_per_day}*{hourly_rate}={daily_overtime_earnings}>>{daily_overtime_earnings} per day for the overtime pay.

She earns a total of ${daily_overtime_earnings} x {normal_work_days_per_week} = $<<{daily_overtime_earnings}*{normal_work_days_per_week}={weekly_overtime_earnings}>>{weekly_overtime_earnings} additional pay for her weekly overtime.
